metadata.title: CVE-2024-46729 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix incorrect size calculation for loop[WHY]fe_clk_en has size of 5 but sizeof(fe_clk_en) has byte size 20 which islager than the array size.[HOW]Divide byte size 20 by its element size.This fixes 2 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
